00031     /*The enum values should not be changed because path manager uses
00032      these values as there currently are
00033     */
00034 
00036         enum UplinkPathType
00037         {
00039             UplinkPathHandsetMic = 0x1,
00041             UplinkPathHeadsetMic = 0x2,
00042             //HF car kit mic
00043             UplinkCarKit = 0x4,
00045             UplinkPathI2S1_Rx = 0x8,
00047             UplinkPathTTY = 0x10,
00049             UplinkPathRecordingHandsetMic = 0x20,
00050             // this path has special settings that avoid some echo canceling issues
00051             UplinkPathDthfMic = 0x40,
00052             // Bluetooth inband ringing
00053             UplinkPathI2S1InbandRx = 0x80,
00055             UplinkPathNone = 0x0
00056         };
00057

00062             DownlinkPathEarpiece = 0x1,

00066             DownlinkPathStereoHeadset = 0x4,
00068             DownlinkPathBackspeaker = 0x8,
00070             DownlinkPathI2S1_Tx = 0x10,
00072             DownlinkPathTTY = 0x20,
00074             DownlinkCarKit = 0x40,

00078             DownlinkPathExtRingerStereoHeadset = 0x100,
00080             DownlinkPathExtRingerBackspeaker = 0x200,
00082             DownlinkPathExtRingerI2S1_Tx = 0x400,
00084             DownlinkPathBackspeakerStereo = 0x800,
00086             DownlinkPathFmRadioBackspeaker = 0x1000,
00088             DownlinkPathFmRadioHeadset = 0x2000,
00090             DownlinkPathNone = 0x0
00091         };
